Description.Content: Provides support for building and configuring the NFC technologies an application supports.
Defines a set of NFC technologies supported by an Activity.
Defines the XML namespace for the NFC configuratoin, which must be 'urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2'.
A set of 'tech' elements supported by an Activity.
A supported NFC technology such as 'android.nfc.tech.IsoDep'
